AD_MagicMouthGauntlet03.synopsis: A plaque communicating the warning of the Abbess to intruders in the gauntlet. It warns the passerby to turn back and to not disturb the place.

AD_MagicMouthWarning.synopsis: Magic mouth spell communicating the warning of the Abbess to the passing monks. Due to the limitations of the spell this AD can't be longer than 25 words! It warns the passerby of the invasion, and alludes to the plan to destroy it as a last ditch effort.

PAD_GithWeapon.synopsis: AD spoken when approaching the body of a monk with a githyanki longsword through his chest.

AD_MagicMouthGauntlet02.synopsis: A plaque communicating the warning of the Abbess to intruders in the gauntlet. It warns the passerby to turn back and to not disturb the place.

PAD_MagicMouthKnowledgeCheck.synopsis: The player attempts to understand a magic mouth spell cast on a dagger warning the monks of the gith invasion of the monastery a century ago.

Escape.synopsis: This cinematics plays when the Lance fires and the monastery and creche explodes. A heroic escape from a massive explosion.
Escape.how_to_trigger: Trigger the destruction of Lance of the Final Dawn and escape the Monastery.

PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof01.synopsis: The player arrives on the left side of the roof as they are escaping the Lance explosion.
PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof01.how_to_trigger: Use the debug command oe cre_testlance and take the Blood of Lathander from its place.While escaping go to 51; 33; 44.

PAD_EnterGauntlet.synopsis: Player comment that this place does not look abandoned at all.
PAD_EnterGauntlet.how_to_trigger: Plays as soon as the GauntletIntro cinematic plays out.

PAD_Escaping_PortalComment.synopsis: The player arrives on the roof through a portal as they are escaping the Lance explosion.
PAD_Escaping_PortalComment.how_to_trigger: Use the debug command "oe cre_testlance" and take the Blood of Lathander from its place.While escaping go to 74; 35; 56

PAD_Escaping_RightRoof01.synopsis: The player arrives on the right side of the roof as they are escaping the Lance explosion.
PAD_Escaping_RightRoof01.how_to_trigger: Use the debug command "oe cre_testlance" and take the Blood of Lathander from its place.While escaping go to 100; 32; 45

PAD_TreasureRoomDoor.synopsis: Player comments on the strange markings on the door. If they have the key, they comment that they look similar.
PAD_TreasureRoomDoor.how_to_trigger: Plays when the players get near the treasure room door in the secret sun passage.

Disarm.synopsis: The players disarms the lance after having taken or not taken the Blood of Lathander and with or without using the crest.
Disarm.how_to_trigger: Don't take Blood of Lathander then:SAFE TAKE: Insert the crest into the pedestalORTake Blood of Lathander then:CREST DISARM + BARRIER DOWN: Disarm barrier then use the crest in the pedestalCREST DISARM + BARRIER UP: Don't diisarm barrier then use the crest in the pedestalDESTRUCT DISARM + BARRIER UP - Don't disarm barrier and destroy the crystalsDESTRUCT DISARM + BARRIER DOWN - Disarm barrier and destroy the crystalsQuick set-up - oe CRE_testlance

PAD_DeactivateLance.synopsis: Player has disarmed the lance of the final dawn that was about to destroy the building, deactivating the weapon. Player is glad it is over.
PAD_DeactivateLance.how_to_trigger: - Go to CRE_Main_A- In ReCon, enter "oe cre_testlance"- Take the Blood of Lathander- Interact with the pedestal, and insert the Dawnmaster's crest OR Shoot down the four targets around the platform. When all 4 are destroyed the lance is disarmed.- Start walking back up the long corridor.

PAD_MagicMouthGauntletKnowledgeCheck.synopsis: The player attempts to understand a magic mouth spell cast on a statue warning intruders to go leave the sacred area.
PAD_MagicMouthGauntletKnowledgeCheck.how_to_trigger: Click on one of the statues in the Gauntlet

PAD_FindOctogonal.synopsis: Player remarks that this githyanki toy has a peculiar shape, and might well have a purpose beyond its current one (it controls the Lance)
PAD_FindOctogonal.how_to_trigger: Pick up the octogonal item in the githyanki toy chest in the dormitory

PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof02.synopsis: The player arrives nears the edge of the left side of the roof as they are escaping the Lance explosion.
PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof02.how_to_trigger: Use the debug command "oe cre_testlance" and take the Blood of Lathander from its place.While escaping go to 44; 30; 22

PAD_LanceComment.synopsis: The player characters marvel at the massive holy cannon on the roof the Lathander Monastery.

PAD_Escaping_LeftBalcony.synopsis: The player arrives on the right side balcony as they are escaping the Lance explosion.
PAD_Escaping_LeftBalcony.how_to_trigger: Use the debug command "oe cre_testlance" and take the Blood of Lathander from its place.While escaping go to 57; 22; 25

PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance.synopsis: Player has disarmed the lance of the final dawn without ever activating it. The player characters celebrate retrieving the Blood of Lathander, a holy mace.
PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance.how_to_trigger: - Go to CRE_Main_A- In ReCon, enter "oe cre_testlance"- Interact with the pedestal, and insert the Dawnmaster's crest- Start walking back up the long corridor.

PAD_EscapeRoofGarden.synopsis: Player comments that this is the weapon that's causing the rumble and that it's going to blow soon.
PAD_EscapeRoofGarden.how_to_trigger: Plays when the player goes near the charged lance on the roof.

PAD_CrecheDestroyed.synopsis: Group Discussion converted to VoicebarkThis is played after the player escapes the destruction of the Gith Creche.This intentionally excludes Laezel, who has an origin moment if she is present instead.
PAD_CrecheDestroyed.how_to_trigger: Load up CRE_Main_Aopen reconuse "oe cre_testlance"take the blood of lathanderteleport party to -12; 18; -13exit turn based mode and wait for the destruction cinematic to playthe voicebark will play after it ends

PAD_EscapeTookBlood.synopsis: A player gets trapped inside the barrier. If there are other companions nearby, they comment that they need to find a way out or deactivate the machine.
PAD_EscapeTookBlood.how_to_trigger: Plays when the players pick up the blood of Lathander in the lower floor, if the Lance hasn't been deactivated.

AD_MagicMouthGauntlet01.synopsis: A plaque communicating the warning of the Abbess to intruders in the gauntlet. It warns the passerby to turn back and to not disturb the place.

AD_MagicMouthGauntlet03_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MagicMouthGauntlet03_0.text: *The Morninglord's wrath awaits, heretic. Retreat whilst thou can.*
AD_MagicMouthGauntlet03_0.context: NodeContext: the message trails off as the spell runs out of words

AD_MagicMouthWarning_0.speaker: Bust
AD_MagicMouthWarning_0.text: Stand your ground! Keep them busy.

AD_MagicMouthWarning_1.speaker: Bust
AD_MagicMouthWarning_1.text: Lathander forgive me - we have to fire the Lance.

PAD_GithWeapon_0.speaker: Player
PAD_GithWeapon_0.text: That's a githyanki blade if ever I saw one.

PAD_GithWeapon_1.speaker: Player
PAD_GithWeapon_1.text: Amazing that the sword stayed sharp for so long.

AD_MagicMouthGauntlet02_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MagicMouthGauntlet02_0.text: *Lathander's light may be infinite, but his mercy is not. Return. Now.*

PAD_MagicMouthKnowledgeCheck_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MagicMouthKnowledgeCheck_0.text: Talking statues are never a good sign.

PAD_MagicMouthKnowledgeCheck_1.speaker: Player
PAD_MagicMouthKnowledgeCheck_1.text: Looks like a Magic Mouth spell. That voice probably belongs to someone long gone.

Escape_5.context: CinematicNodeContext: A close-up of the chargning lance is shown, reaching its peak and firing.

Escape_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and party on roof, they almost make it to the edge when the gun fires, blasting them back, camera fade to white explosion

Escape_11.context: CinematicNodeContext: Survivors in the courtyard are shown running out of the courtyard, towards the bridge.

Escape_8.context: CinematicNodeContext: The characters run across the bridge as wall section falls and destroys/blocks the bridge. If possible have character dive to safety

Escape_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Survivor who escaped an alternate route watches this from the safe location. No character in frame as wall section falls and destroys/blocks the bridge.

Escape_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: A wide shot of the Monastery exploding.

Escape_1.context: CinematicNodeContext: A survivor who was completely outside, is shown in a non-specific outdoor area with a rocky-grassy backdrop looking backaround their shoulder. Their face is illuminated by the glow of the explosion.

Escape_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Survivors are show together, gathering in a safe location past the bridge.

Escape_10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and party on roof, they almost make it to the edge when the gun fires, blasting them back, camera fade to white explosion

Escape_9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player and party on roof, they almost make it to the edge when the gun fires, blasting them back, camera fade to white explosion

Escape_12.context: CinematicNodeContext: A player character left in the Monastery is shown running down a non-specific monastery corridor, but they are hit by a falling statue.

Escape_13.context: CinematicNodeContext: A character left the creche is shown running down a non-specific corridor in the creche, but they are hit by a falling statue.

PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof01_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof01_0.text: I need to get off this building before that thing explodes!

PAD_EnterGauntlet_0.speaker: Player
PAD_EnterGauntlet_0.text: Remarkable that this stayed hidden all this time.

PAD_Escaping_PortalComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Escaping_PortalComment_0.text: Good thing it went up - now to get out of here.

PAD_Escaping_RightRoof01_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Escaping_RightRoof01_0.text: I need to get off this roof NOW!

PAD_TreasureRoomDoor_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TreasureRoomDoor_0.text: Quite an elaborate door, for a tunnel underground.

PAD_TreasureRoomDoor_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TreasureRoomDoor_1.text: Oh. I saw a key earlier with those same markings.

Disarm_1.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Destroyed crystals shown with small smoke effect and/or sparks, having fizzled out.

(NO BARRIER / CRYSTALS DESTROYED)

Disarm_7.context: CinematicNodeContext: Barrier forcefield turns off and the ring sinks, locking back into the floor.

Disarm_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: The glow from the four crystals fades off each them in quick succession.

Disarm_2.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The beam turns off, and the portal closes.
The gyro glow fades and the rings stop spinning, slowly shuddering to a stop.
The pillars retract back down.

The player looks around in relief, and then in admiration at the mace in their hand.

Disarm_3.context:
CinematicNodeContext: Destroyed crystals shown with small smoke effect and/or sparks, having fizzled out.

(BARRIER ACTIVE / CRYSTALS DESTROYED)

Disarm_4.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The crest clicks into place.

The player looks up in the direction of the gyro.

(NO BARRIER / CRYSTALS LIT)

Disarm_5.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The crest clicks into place.

The player looks up in the direction of the gyro.

(BARRIER ACTIVE / CRYSTALS LIT)

Disarm_6.context:
CinematicNodeContext: The crest clicks into place, floor hinges unlock, and the ring on the floor begins to spin.

Any companions step back, and the player looks around in positive anticipation.

The floor ring slowly rises up as the four pillars also rise, the crystals they're topped with starting to glow warmly as if suffused with sunlight.

The still-spinning floor ring aligns with the gyro, and as it also begins to move and rotate a glow forms at its core.  - The gyro aligns its rings into a flat horizontal plane over the mace.  -  A shaft of light coming down around mace, as the gyro glow fades and the mace’s glow intensifies.

The mace unlocks from its rigid upright position and begins floating in the shaft of light in a slanted, bobbing, “take me” manner.

The player gently takes the mace as the other glows fade slightly, admiring the mace’s pulsing glow as companions step forward.

PAD_DeactivateLance_0.speaker: Player
PAD_DeactivateLance_0.text: That was close - this entire place would've been destroyed.

PAD_DeactivateLance_1.speaker: Player
PAD_DeactivateLance_1.text: Dying under this monastery would've been a shame.

PAD_DeactivateLance_5.speaker: Player
PAD_DeactivateLance_5.text: Perhaps we should exercise a touch more caution in future.

PAD_DeactivateLance_3.speaker: Player
PAD_DeactivateLance_3.text: We endangered the crèche and its people - and to what end?

PAD_DeactivateLance_6.speaker: Player
PAD_DeactivateLance_6.text: Does it matter? We managed to stop it.

PAD_DeactivateLance_4.speaker: Player
PAD_DeactivateLance_4.text: Such insouciance. You cannot comprehend the destruction we nearly triggered.

PAD_MagicMouthGauntletKnowledgeCheck_1.speaker: Player
PAD_MagicMouthGauntletKnowledgeCheck_1.text: A Magic Mouth spell. Sounds pretty important.

PAD_FindOctogonal_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FindOctogonal_0.text: The shape is odd, feels strangely familiar...

PAD_FindOctogonal_1.speaker: Player
PAD_FindOctogonal_1.text: This shape feels deliberate, like it might have some sort of purpose.

PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof02_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Escaping_LeftRoof02_0.text: No more roof. Time to get down from here.

PAD_LanceComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_LanceComment_0.text: Looks to be a powerful weapon. I wonder if it was used on the githyanki nearby.

PAD_LanceComment_1.speaker: Player
PAD_LanceComment_1.text: Looks like it would've made a powerful weapon.

PAD_Escaping_LeftBalcony_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Escaping_LeftBalcony_0.text: Nearly out - just a bit further!

PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance_3.speaker: Player
PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance_3.text: Quite a heavily guarded treasure, good job we got past those protections.

PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance_0.speaker: Player
PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance_0.text: This artefact must've been precious to the monks.

PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance_1.speaker: Player
PAD_PreventiveDisarmLance_1.text: That's no surprise. It looks powerful.

PAD_EscapeRoofGarden_0.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeRoofGarden_0.text: The machine - it's going to blow!

PAD_CrecheDestroyed_1.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheDestroyed_1.text: Wish it could've been avoided. It was pretty beautiful.

PAD_CrecheDestroyed_2.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheDestroyed_2.text: It's gone - the entire crèche is destroyed.

PAD_CrecheDestroyed_3.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheDestroyed_3.text: It's a pity. That place was pretty beautiful.

PAD_CrecheDestroyed_4.speaker: Player
PAD_CrecheDestroyed_4.text: Barely got away. Those githyanki aren't so lucky.

PAD_EscapeTookBlood_0.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_0.text: Oh gods, the whole building is collapsing...
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_0.context: NodeContext: Building is starting to collapse around you.

PAD_EscapeTookBlood_1.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_1.text: Help! Get me out of this thing before the whole building collapses!
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_1.context: NodeContext: Character realises they're trapped and the building is about to come down

PAD_EscapeTookBlood_2.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_2.text: Hang on, we need to find a way out of this chamber as well!

PAD_EscapeTookBlood_6.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_6.text: There must be a way to get them out. Someone else find a way out of here!

PAD_EscapeTookBlood_3.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_3.text: I need to get out of here!

PAD_EscapeTookBlood_5.speaker: Player
PAD_EscapeTookBlood_5.text: Hells, I need to get out of here.

AD_MagicMouthGauntlet01_0.speaker: Narrator
AD_MagicMouthGauntlet01_0.text: *If thou readst this, trespasser: turn back, lest your life be forfeit.*
